zeroconf_confirm.title: Discovered Rebooter Pro
zeroconf_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {model} with serial {serial}?

user.title: Add Rebooter Pro
user.description: Enter the device hostname (e.g., `rebooter-pro.local`) or IP address.

data_description.host: Use the device hostname (e.g., rebooter-pro.local) or IP address.

abort.already_configured: This Rebooter Pro is already configured.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check the host and try again.

init.title: Rebooter Pro Options
init.description: Configure automatic reboot behavior and optional push notifications.

data_description.ar_off_duration_seconds: When rebooting, keep the power off for this many seconds (10–65535).
data_description.ar_power_fail: If enabled, the equipment will reboot after power is restored.
data_description.ar_ping_fail: If enabled, the equipment will reboot on Internet/Ping failures.
data_description.ar_trigger_minutes: Reboot after unsuccessfully reaching the monitored addresses for this long in minutes (2–10).
data_description.ar_post_reboot_delay_minutes: After restoring power, wait this long, in minutes, before resuming Internet/Ping monitoring (0–10).
data_description.ar_any_fail: Choose whether to reboot if ANY of the addresses are unreachable or if ALL addresses are unreachable.
data_description.ar_max_reboots: If Internet/Ping monitoring never detects a recovery, reboot at most this many times.
data_description.ar_target_5: Address or hostname to ping to determine if your device is offline.
data_description.notify_enabled: Home Assistant will send a notification when state changes.

send_test_notification.name: Send test notification
send_test_notification.description: Send a test push using the integration's selected notify service (defaults to notify.notify).

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: Target Rebooter Pro config entry ID. If omitted and only one device exists, that one is used.

message.name: Message
message.description: Notification body. If omitted, a default message is generated.

code.name: Code
code.description: Optional device code to auto-generate a default message (1=OFF, 2=ON, 3=REBOOTING).
